Name: Critical Mass
About the game: Critical Mass is an action puzzle game that takes traditional match 3 and brings it into the world of 3D. We combine fast addictive game play with strategy to create a new and innovative experience. Key features: Fast Addictive Gameplay 4 Unique Game Modes Online Leaderboards & Ranking Systems Achievements & Skillpoint Rewards Accessible to Everyone Exciting Colorful Art Style Great Music & Sound Effects.
